sentences.english: Serving desserts brings a sweet life in the new year.
sentences.chinese: 春節期間喫甜食，寓意新年甜甜蜜蜜。

sentences.english: Ever and anon feed Azrael to drink an one morsel, 2 human all laugh very sweetly.
sentences.chinese: 時不時地喂着死神喝一口，兩人都笑得甜蜜蜜。

sentences.english: Everything about her was sweet, pale, like honey .
sentences.chinese: 她渾身上下都是甜蜜蜜，軟綿綿的，象蜂蜜那樣。

sentences.english: I only love you that small, but you can't give.
sentences.chinese: 我要的只是那種甜甜蜜蜜的小愛情，你卻不能給。

sentences.english: The dark silence is already full of sweetness.
sentences.chinese: 漆黑的安靜就已經充滿了甜甜蜜蜜了。

sentences.english: But although Tom's ear tingled , his heart was jubilant.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆雖然感到耳朵很疼，但心裏卻是甜蜜蜜的。

definition: Jacky Cheung or Hok Yau Jacky (1961-), Cantopop and film star
spring sunshine emerges to bring the world alive (idiom)/to give a glimpse of sth intimate (e.g. one's underwear)
Eason Chan (1974-), Hong Kong pop singer and actor
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
Leslie Cheung (1956-2003), Hong Kong singer and actor
fig. restless, because of fear or strong emotions
